title: The Price of Innocence
description:
The key to Teresa MacLean's latest case lies in a 25-year-old unsolved murder
Called out to investigate a suspected suicide in a luxury high-rise apartment, forensic scientist Theresa MacLean only just escapes with her life when the building is blown to smithereens. An accident â€“ or something more sinister? A mostly empty block of trendy apartments in downtown Cleveland seems an unlikely terrorist target.
author: Lisa Black
